column4: knives and swords. Daniel Falconer. http://www.wetanz.com/chronicles-cloaks-and-daggers-signed/ The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug Chronicles: Cloaks and Daggers. p.95.  When Thorin refuses to allow Kíli to go with the others to the Lonely Mountain due to his weakened state (from being struck by a poisoned arrow)
column5: Fíli opts to stay behind in Lake-town (along with de facto group healer Óin) and look after his younger brother. In the Battle of Five Armies
column6: he goes to assist Thorin (along with Kíli and Dwalin) at the top of Ravenhill in an attempt to kill the Orcs armys leader
column8: when searching for the Pale Orc
column9: Fíli is cornered by him and some of his soldiers. Azog then takes Fíli out in front of the other Dwarves
column10: impales him with the sword attached to his left arm
column11: and drops his body onto the rock below him as the others watch in horror.
